content.rendered:
What We Do

We help organizations create long-term value with our Accounting, Auditing, Assurance, Consulting, and Tax Advisory services.

Free Consultation
Main Menu
  • Our Company
  • Our Team
  • Company News

A&A Associate LLCTransforming Businesses Through Innovation

A&A Associate is a UAE registered Management Consultancy firm providing cost-effective value-added solutions to meet all your business needs under one roof. We follow the highest level of professional ethics and quality in our services.

We have a fast-growing team of qualified & dedicated professionals with innovative and commercial approach to meet today’s highly challenging business environment. Our services include: VAT Compliant Accounting Services in Dubai, Audit Services in Dubai , Financial Management Advisory, Corporate Finance, Feasibility Study, Business Plan, Business Consultancy, Company Formation, PRO Services, Liquidation Services, Tax Residency Certificates and Offshore Registration.

We provide fresh perspectives & new ways to look at your business through Business Analysis, Creative Insight & Industry Benchmarking. We act as a Sounding board for crucial financial decisions and provide dependable strategic leadership through our experience and knowledge.

0

Years of
Experience

0 +
Dedicated Team
0 +
Consultaions
0 +
Audit Completed

Although we have different origins and cultural upbringings, being one of the best accounting firms in UAE we collectively embrace common values. These shared principles serve as a compass, directing our interactions with clients and colleagues, shaping the nature of our work, and holding us accountable to give our utmost effort. They govern our behavior and determine our achievements.

Brief overview of our services

At A&A Associate LLC, we pride ourselves on offering a comprehensive range of services tailored to meet our clients’ needs. With years of experience in the industry, we specialize in providing top-notch accounting, auditing, advisory solutions and Corporate tax services in Dubai.
Our accounting services encompass everything from bookkeeping and financial statement preparation to tax planning and compliance. We work closely with our clients to ensure their financial records are accurate and up-to-date, allowing them to make informed business decisions.
As for auditing, we conduct thorough examinations of our clients’ financial statements to provide an objective and independent assessment. Our skilled auditors meticulously review records, internal controls, and financial processes, helping our clients maintain transparency and compliance.
Additionally, our advisory services offer strategic guidance to assist clients in maximizing their business potential. We provide expert advice on areas such as risk management, financial planning, and business expansion, helping our clients achieve their goals and drive success.
With our dedicated team of professionals and commitment to excellence, we strive to deliver exceptional services that empower our clients to thrive in today’s dynamic business environment.

Our Vision

A&A Associate aspires in becoming market leader in the MENA region by providing all value added services for “Businesses” to innovate and create business model that enriches maximum profitability and sustainability.

Our Mission

Creating “Happy Customers” by providing quality services that help transform Businesses.

Top reasons for using our services

Expertise

Expertise: Our team consists of highly skilled professionals with extensive knowledge and experience in accounting, auditing, advisory and bookkeeping services in UAE.

Strategic Guidance:

Our advisory services provide valuable insights and strategic guidance to optimize financial performance and achieve business goals.

Time and Resource Savings

By outsourcing these services to us, clients can focus on their core competencies while we handle their financial needs efficiently

Competitive Advantage:

Our services enable clients to gain a competitive edge by leveraging our expertise and insights.

Accuracy and Compliance:

We ensure accurate financial information and help clients stay compliant with relevant regulations and standards.

Risk Management:

We help clients identify and mitigate financial risks, enhancing overall stability and security.

Trusted Partner:

We build long-term relationships based on trust, confidentiality, and integrity, providing reliable support and solutions.

Customized Solutions:

We tailor our services to meet specific client requirements, ensuring personalized and effective solutions.

What value do you derive from these services

Our services provide immense value to our clients. Through our accounting, auditing, and advisory solutions, we offer accurate financial information, ensure compliance with regulations, and provide strategic guidance for Audit service in UAE. This enables our clients to make informed decisions, mitigate risks, optimize their financial performance, and achieve their goals. We take pride in being a trusted partner who helps our clients navigate complex financial matters, enhance their operations, and ultimately drive their success.

Our Channel Partners

Accurate Middle East

Accurate Middle East is a Dubai based boutique consulting company designed for advanced tech and innovative businesses willing to enter and expand within the Middle Eastern region, in particular, United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Kuwait, Bahrein, Jordan and Egypt.

We work closely
with all Government Agencies

Starting a business in Dubai. We can help you set up in a Free Zone, on Mainland or Offshore.

Request for Our

Free Consultation
Starting a business in Dubai. We can
help you set up in a Free Zone
